For to me, to live <S%G2198><s%> is Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and to die <S%G599><s%> is gain. <S%G2771><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> [I am] to live <S%G2198><s%> [on] in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> [will mean] fruitful <S%G2590><s%> labor <S%G2041><s%> for me; and I do not know <S%G1107><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> to choose. <S%G138><s%>

yet <S%G1161><s%> to remain <S%G1961><s%> on in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is more <S%G316><s%> necessary <S%G316><s%> for your sake. <S%G1223><s%>
